website_summaries.verdict: A universal socket wrench that is easy to use and will serve you well for years to come.
pros: Works great for indoor and outdoor tasks, car, motorcycle and bike repairs and any other projects that require you to screw or unscrew various shapes of bolts or nuts
Chrome steel construction guarantees the wrench is built to last
Intended for use for up to 3/4" bolt heads and 2" eyebolts
cons: May be tough to use the wrench in tight spaces

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Except the one plastic piece that broke
customer_reviews.text: Would rate 5 stars as everything about this is perfect for a person who uses a lot of tools regularly, but the piece the bit attached to the handle at is made of plastic and broke during the first use. Don't rely on the ratchet, use one you trust and you'll be golden!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Angell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This helps me put together and secure my workout equipment really well. It tightens the nuts and bolts and is great for all sizes. No need for an entire socket wrench kit with all the different sizes since this is universal. I am glad I bought it and the price is really reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: I thought having this socket will solve my problem, but I was wrong. It couldn't make the job and it got crushed under pressure. I am giving 3 stars because may be the job I had was too difficult for this general purpose socket.
customer_reviews.author: Namrood

customer_reviews.title: It's a must have for your toolbox!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as gifts for my brother who is a car mechanic and for my husband who is a auto body tech. They both were so excited to use these. I was worried if they would work like they said and it did not disappoint. It comes in a nice box that can be used to hold them so they don't get lost in the toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: gator grips woooooooooooo
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I've wanted one of these since I saw my first gator grip infomercial ... wow it must be over a decade ago now. I have bajillions of drill etc bits, but ESPECIALLY the one for installing hooks is obnoxious as heck. It slips off all the time. This works for nearly anything as long as it fits in the "teeth?" Whatever those thingies are called. I wish I had one of these years ago. Certainly would have been saved from bloody fingers from weird shaped things slipping off their assigned bit.
customer_reviews.author: adam piekarski

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Invention Ever
customer_reviews.text: If you have never used one of these tools to remove odd configured nuts, bolts, screws or cup hangers, you just don't know what you are missing. I recommend one of these, if not two, for every tool box or glove box in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Roger E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little tool I was a bit skeptical at first but the stuff it fits works well. You would definitely still need a regular set eith different length heads for certain things. That being said still a cool tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Codey G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy and does exactly what's needed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, handy and does exactly what it is supposed to. The box it comes in is similar to a nice one set box.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me tried changing my bike tire destroyed the nut still will not open
customer_reviews.author: Zuhair Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for people who love tools
customer_reviews.text: I got this item as a gift for someone who has every tool you could think of. Lucked out and they didnt have this. They've used it and said it works great. Perfect dad gift! Might get one for myself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Guenthner

customer_reviews.title: Great value, does what it says - it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This tool is really useful for almost any nut size. Adjust super well and gets the job done much faster and a great add on to my toolbox. Feels well-made and i expect it to last a good while. Great value, does what it says - it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Looked great on TV but...
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use this on a single bolt. Nice box but I needed a tool to do what I saw on TV. Not so.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome for when you need to work on something quick and can't find a wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I got this without a use in mind for it because it seemed like it would be convenient if I ever needed it. I have already used it several times where it was a huge convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced most of sockets
customer_reviews.text: I only need this one now, not all the sets of sockets and ratchets that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: this is the perfect do it all socket to keep in my car ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted one of these things and now my dream has come true! Seriously though, this is the perfect do it all socket to keep in my car or motorcycle. Way better than lugging a full tool kit around.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use socket
customer_reviews.text: Very cool idea, remember it from a long time ago. Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jjchef

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Completes our set of tools and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Completes our set of tools and is easy to use and high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Meinecke

customer_reviews.title: My Dad Was Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my dad. He hasn’t used it yet because he hasn’t gotten any husband chores yet from my mom but he was suuuuper excited when he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool—saves space and money—very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. We have a furniture repair man restoring our furniture after our house flooded. I let him use this to put a table together, and he was very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Varner

customer_reviews.title: Cool little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Cool little gadget, and a great add on to my toolbox. I used it to open some screws on my bike and it worked well. No need to look for the right tool for each screw. On the other side, it looks like it will only be good for small jobs, nothing heavy duty. Comes in a nice gift box.
customer_reviews.author: oferico

customer_reviews.title: Time-Saving.
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! Eliminates searching for the correct socket every time. Easy and time saving. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, not practical
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than anticipated. I bought it to help install I-bolt type rings for hanging chairs, but way too small for that or other practical applications.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wrench, a must-have tool
customer_reviews.text: Solid build quality, works great. Brilliantly engineered, highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying this!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Should have bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: katz

customer_reviews.title: Grip is loose
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the grip is loose. It takes time to fit perfectly and then I can move it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Y

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool to have.
customer_reviews.text: So much better than having a ton of different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He says this is a great product & can be used in so many ways. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Nicely boxed.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a gift. I think my granddaughter liked it more than my grandson-in-law! I'm sure it will be used.
customer_reviews.author: C. Markus

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He likes it
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This will be a Christmas gift. I'm sure the recipient will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Don & Jackie Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work and was so excited to try it.so far its terrible.I will update this if I change my mind and a start to like it but it slips and don't loosen the bolts.updated.i yook of tut o work and it sucks.going yo try for my money back
customer_reviews.author: Spider7279

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent socket works great looks quality and also excellent price.. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mendy

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is great. As advertised it fits all different kinds of screws/nuts. Worth the money and is a quality product for the handyman.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Product works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little toe to have around the house work screen as described.
customer_reviews.author: Limo Driver / Chauffeur/City Bus Driver

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: My husband like it soo much. Very useful and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Marcano

customer_reviews.title: Good product for just in case purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Not the best match but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Zhengli Ding

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever for the guy who has it all
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my boyfriend for his birthday and he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hook

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it was great! I didn’t get to use it but he seemed excited about it
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMarie Sivrais

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This ratchet has worked for me exactly as promised. Very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: KCee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't always fit in smaller space but it gets the job done most of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Xenoturtle

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for price
customer_reviews.text: Has helped me out with a few projects. Can sometimes be hard to use in a 1 handed situation. Other than that, great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lazar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and useful tool which actually works on most of the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: jobin t.

customer_reviews.title: One for all
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom who knows nothing about fixing anything but I know this will come in handy
customer_reviews.author: Mama_Breena

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: kinda hard to use in tight spaces. did not grip as i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Doney Mik

customer_reviews.text: Nice concept, but hard to take a screw out especially in small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: well built and high quality stuff . Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: RM , Washington DC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good yet the price is very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Eulogio Jr Flores

customer_reviews.title: he loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my brother in laws bday, he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: I love it wish I bought it sooner I would have ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it wish I bought it sooner I would have saved a lot of time working on my car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price and the tool is as described
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

product_meta.title: DIA-GRIP Universal Socket 3pcs Tool set (7-19mm) |Bushing Ratchet wrench set | Magical Grip Socket | Wrench Power Drill Adapter Set | Multifunctional Professional Repair Tool | Handyman special
product_meta.description:
Are you looking for an essential tool for your house repairs? 

Are you tired of using thatold and bulky toolbox? 

Orare you searching for a useful gift for a beloved friend that just moved in theirnew home? 

One thing is certain...you are in the right place for what you need...

Introducing the Ultimate Wrench Set In A Single Tool By DIA-GRIP! 

Our universal socket is crafted with chromoly steel and features 54 concave heavy-duty pins for effective applications. 

This one-tool wrench set provides you with enhanced leverage for reliable performance and maximum convenience. 

Multipurpose Tool

This wrench bushing set delivers accurate appliance and extended bolts compatibility suitable for any kind of repair work. 

You can screw or unscrew literally any bolt or nut shape and you can even use it on damaged bolt heads! 

This socket drill adapter features a compact design, easy to store in your home or car, 100% portable to assist you wherever needed. 

The Perfect Gift

Offer this handy universal socket tool to any DIY enthusiast friend and theywill definitely appreciate it. 

This innovational tool will make theirlife easier! 

Product Details: 

 Chromium-molybdenum steel material

 54 durable steel pins

 For up to 3/4" bolt heads & 2”eyebolts

 Silver color

 Gift ready

Place your Order & Get Yours Before Our Supplies Run Out! 

Scroll Up & Click “Add To Cart” Without Second Thoughts!
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: This universal socket is crafted with chromoly steel and has 54 chromoly steel pins that feature supreme strength and provide you with a reliable and durable tool for efficient applications and convenient use.

ULTRA-EFFECTIVE TOOL: This is an easy to use, universal wrench designed to deliver accurate appliance, extended bolts compatibility and increased leverage performance for maximum convenience at any type of repair.

EFFICIENT VERSATILE APPLICATION: The DIA-GRIP Socket adapter grip wrench is appropriate for indoor or outdoor tasks and any car, motorcycle or bike repair that allows you to screw or unscrew various shapes of bolts or nuts effortlessly. Regardless of using eyebolt, wingnut, square-nut, hooks, even rusted or damaged bolt heads nothing can resist our tool!

FOR GUILTLESS TOOLBOX REPLACEMENT: This lightweight socket drill adapter grip has a compact design, it is always ready for any type of use, easy to store and portable to assist you in case of any emergency situation. This innovational ratchet wrench is designed to make your life simpler!

EXCELLENT GIFT IDEA: This amazing silver color, universal socket set is available in an elegant gift box ready to be gifted to any friend or family member. A helpful and practical present that will impress any DIY enthusiast!
